issues.description: The problem statement requires that every class/interface is declared public (problem_statement.md line 5). The reference solution declares the interface Pneumatic without the public modifier (solution_repository/src/de/tum/in/ase/Pneumatic.java lines 1-9), making it package-private. This contradicts the explicit requirement and could confuse students or cause tests that check for public visibility to fail.
issues.suggested_fix: Declare the Pneumatic interface public in the template and solution (change to 'public interface Pneumatic { ... }'), or update the problem statement to allow package-private interfaces. Prefer making the interface public to match the exercise requirement that all classes/interfaces be public.
